spells.name: Hostile Juxtaposition
spells.description: You create a dimensional link with a targeted creature, and switch spots with it.

spells.name: Protection from Energy, Communal
spells.description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Stoneskin, Communal
spells.description: As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Summoner Conduit
spells.description: The target takes damage whenever its summoned creature does.

spells.name: Tongues, Communal
spells.description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
